mods.abstract: $100 REWARD. NEGROES RUNAWAY. THE above reward will be paid for the apprehension of the following described negroes and delivered at my Plantation, on Cote Joyeuse, Parish of Natchitoches, about 3 1/2 miles from the Town. OLD BOB, a negro man, aged about 35 years, of clear complexion, stout, built 5 feet 10 inches high. BLACK BOB, a negro man aged 20 years, very black complexion, 5 feet 8 inches high, and weighs about 150 pounds. OPHY, a negro man, aged 20 years black complexion, measuring 5 feet 9 inches. THOMAS M. DICKERSON. feb.16-4t
mods.accessCondition: Please submit an LSU Special Collections reference ticket at https://askus.lib.lsu.edu/special for any questions or comments about this digital object.

Physical rights are retained by the LSU Libraries. Copyright has expired and the item is therefore in the public domain. Permission to reproduce this image must be requested through the Special Collections Department, Louisiana State University Libraries.
mods.note: Louisiana Runaway Slave Advertisements, 1836-1865, Louisiana Digital Library, Baton Rouge, La.
